TopicTitle: Can't get visual mods to work.

Articles.Content: So I've been trying to reinstall eve scatterer and avp. But none of them will work except for scatterer. I have been using ckan, and i am using ksp 1.7.3. I've also tried to just install eve sve, and module manager. that doesn't work either. any help?
Very odd, works fine here (I tried both, SVE and AVP). You have more information about your install, mod list?
Right now i have no other mods installed. I've also tried installing eve sve, and module manager manually. Here are some screenshots of what i did manually  https://imgur.com/gallery/LGc9I2z
So i installed eve sve and module manager on my steam version that's running 1.8, and it worked fine. What could make the other version not work?
Hmm... out of good ideas, then a poor one: you installed both, AVP and a texture pack for it? Without texture pack, it can't work, of course.
